alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Murray (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 9:19AM CDT until April 19 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River near Mitchell affecting Hanson and Davison Counties. Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca affecting Murray and Cottonwood Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River near Trent affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Egan affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Lyon, Minnehaha and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Union, Sioux and Lincoln Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 1425.0 feet, the lower pasture and farm land begins flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 1425.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM CDT Sunday was 1425.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday evening and continue falling to 1423.9 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 1425.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed West Fork Des Moines River Avoca 1425.0 1425.5 Sun 8 am 1425. 1425. 1424. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning by around 1100 AM CDT.
